titlestmt.titleproper: Ford Foundation records, Program Division, Office of the Vice President, Office Files of Andrea L. Taylor
A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, Program Division, Office of the Vice President, Office Files of Andrea L. Taylor FA684

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2019-11-23 01:14:37 -0500.

did.unittitle: Ford Foundation records, Program Division, Office of the Vice President, Office Files of Andrea L. Taylor

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Level 1 Minimal Processing has been conducted to establish basic intellectual and physical control of the material and assess immediate preservation and conservation needs. Material remains as received, in original folders and storage boxes.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access note
accessrestrict.p: Material is open for scholarly research, with prior archival review.
Material more than ten years old is open for scholarly research.
Select individual files are restricted, as noted. Permission to access these files must be obtained from the Ford Foundation before scholarly access is permitted.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use note
userestrict.p: Completion of a use agreement is required prior to providing scholarly access. See RAC Head of Reference (or applicable designee) for details. Ford Foundation holds title, copyright and literary rights in the collection, in so far as it holds them. The Rockefeller Archive Center has authority to grant permission to cite and publish material from the collection for scholarly purposes. Permission to publish extensive excerpts, or material in its entirety, will be referred to the Ford Foundation.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation note
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than 10 years old are open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Records focus in the area of community foundations.

did.unittitle: Ford Foundation/MacArthur Foundation -- Leadership Program for Community Foundations
